name: Boom Bam Slime Slam
description:
uh oh the purple dog slimes won't stop mutliplying out of control! kill them!! no overpopulation!! dieeeee!!!! BOOm bOp BaM SliPperY SlimY SLaaaaaaAAAaaM

Left click and drag to throw, right click and drag to split your slime and throw!

Instructions:

-left click and drag to throw a slime, right click and drag to throw and split your slimes.
-if you throw the same type of friendly slimes into each other they'll merge into one -size up, if you hit a different type friendly slime you springboard off it.
-hitting your slimes into the enemy dog slimes deals damage and knocks them back and the smaller the slime the more damage they deal.
-if you slam the purple ones together they merge into blue, if you smack blue together they merge into a health pickup.
